passwordFieldError: This field is required and should contain at least 6 characters
emailField: This field is required and should contain a valid email address, e.g jsmith@example.com
registerSuccess: A link to activate your account has been emailed to the address provided. In case you did not receive the email click here to re-send it.
resetPasswordEmailSuccess: If that email address belongs to an account, we will send you an email to reset your password.
verifyEmailSuccess: Your account has been activated. You can now login by using your credentials.
resendVerificationEmailSuccess: A link to activate your account has been emailed to the address provided. In case you did not receive the email click here to re-send it.
resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.
resendVerificationEmailError: An error occurred while sending the verification email. Please make sure that the information you provided is correct and retry in 1 minute.
resetPasswordEmailError: An error occurred while processing your request. Please make sure that you have an account with the provided email address and that you did not send another password reset request recently. Please try again in 1 minute.
registerError: Your account could not be created. Please make sure that you have not registered already with the same email address (unique) or you haven't activated you account yet (check your inbox and maybe your SPAM folder). Please try again.
loginError: Login failed. Please make sure that you have provided the correct credentials (email and password).
